channel.title: ::allstafftome
channel.description:
has anyone got a command that brings all of my staff to me?
also when i make a new shop it either disconnects people or it jsut gives them random fish lol wtf? lol

I’m not completely sure, but did this stafftome idea come from yours truly, The Reaper X? I’m almost positive I released it in one of my sources.

It also makes it easier to spot errors.

item.title: ::allstafftome
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Server Creator Brian, post:2, topic:260378”]if(command.equals(“staffmeeting”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights >= 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}
}[/quote]
wtfwtfwtftwtftwf

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("allstafftome") && playerRights >= 3) { // Yeah, equalsIgnoreCase. CASE INSENSITIVITY
    for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // ye a for-each loop
        if(p != null) {
            if(p.playerRights >= 1) {
                p.teleportToX = absX;
                p.teleportToY = absY;
            } // proper indentation FTW
        } // proper indentation FTW
    } // proper indentation FTW
} // proper indentation FTW

Read full topic

item.title: ::allstafftome
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

if(command.equals(“staffmeeting”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
if(castOn.playerRights >= 1)
{
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}
}

Read full topic
